channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Pedestrian Struck by Train; INC#0492; 09:44AM; 6900 Vineland Ave; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/YRBysA7kz98jj76z6" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/YRBysA7kz98jj76z6</a>; #NorthHollywood; PRELIM: One pedestrian (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased after apparently being struck by southbound Amtrak Pacific Surfliner Train #770. The person and train remain at scene. None of the approximately 150 persons aboard the intercity passenger train are injured. Media Inquiries: Amtrak, LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1566) and Medical Examiner.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E60 E86 E89 EM5 HR3 RA257 RA60 T39 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0323; 08:15AM; 21724 W Napa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QQfkjc" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QQfkjc</a>; #CanogaPark; Firefighters performing an exhaustive search of the densely packed 1,320 square foot home discovered three dogs within the otherwise unoccupied residence. Though one of the dogs was discovered alive and provided supportive care by firefighters, the other two dogs sadly perished in the smoke charged building. The three adult residents were away from their home at the time of the fire. No human injuries have been reported. The cause of the fire remains under active investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E273 E305 E72 RA104 RA96 T105 T73; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0323; 07:47AM; 21724 W Napa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QQfkjc" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QQfkjc</a>; #CanogaPark; Firefighters forced entry into the unoccupied 1,320 square foot one-story single family home to encounter excessive storage and heavy fire in one room at the southwest corner the residence. Though flames extended through the attic, 32 LAFD Firefighters extinguished the stubborn fire in just 30 minutes. No human injury. A search continues for three missing dogs. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E273 E305 E72 RA104 RA96 T105 T73; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0323; 07:17AM; 21724 W Napa St; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/qBYm6d7DoJT7jZpM7" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/qBYm6d7DoJT7jZpM7</a>; #CanogaPark; PRELIM: Offensive firefighting operations at a one-story home with heavy smoke showing.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E273 E305 E72 RA104 RA96 T105 T73; CH0; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1279; 05:14PM; 6230 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bAesqU" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bAesqU</a>; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision with one person trapped. #LATraffic: Closure of both northbound and southbound Sepulveda Boulevard between Victory Boulevard and Erwin Street until LAFD & LAPD operations are complete. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3585). ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E239 E290 E39 EM14 HR3 RA100 RA839 RA90 T39 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: End of Police Pursuit Trapped Vehicle 05/17/2024 INC#0251

item.description: End of Police Pursuit Trapped Vehicle; INC#0251; 05:25AM; Nb 405 Fy; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wFcjuW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wFcjuW</a>; #Brentwood; Firefighters arrived to a traffic accident involving Police Officers who were in pursuit of a vehicle. This resulted in a vehicle crashing into parked vehicles and hitting a Police car. Four total Officers with one being transported to an area hospital. This incident expanded to the freeway where the van did go the wrong way and the pursuit ended with crashing into three vehicles on the freeway. No extrication was needed. One patient was transported to an area hospital. The incident is now static. ; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC9 E109 E19 E237 E37 E71 EM14 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 12; Krishan Vadukul

Update Technical Rescue ; INC#0899; 02:30PM; 11070 W Wilshire Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3UJ1UXa" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3UJ1UXa</a>; #Sawtelle ; Firefighters were called to a working construction site where material was dropped below grade onto one worker and brushed against a second worker. Both workers were transported to an area hospital. The scene is now static.; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC731 BC9 CM52 E19 E227 E237 E292 E37 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA59 RA827 RA92 SO1 T27 T37 T92 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Krishan Vadukul

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0899; 02:00PM; 1150 S Bonsall Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QKWolG" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QKWolG</a>; outside city; Firefighters, while below grade, found a second patient. Both patients were successfully extricated and transported to an area hospital in unknown conditions. The circumstances of the incident have yet to be confirmed. ; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC731 BC9 CM52 E19 E227 E237 E292 E37 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA59 RA827 RA92 SO1 T27 T37 T92 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Krishan Vadukul

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0899; 01:16PM; 1150 S Bonsall Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QKWolG" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QKWolG</a>; outside city; Firefighters found one patient below grade trapped with leg injuries. Firefighters are currently extricating the patient to street level. ; FS 37; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA59 RA92 T37 T92 UR88; CH7; 12; Krishan Vadukul

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire ; INC#0610; 10:59AM; 6557 N Mclennan Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QMMrnR" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QMMrnR</a>; #LakeBalboa; It took 39 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames in this one-story single family home. Fire began in the kitchen, and all occupants escaped the house prior to fire department arrival; several cats were pulled to safety by firefighters and treated for smoke inhalation. No surrounding homes were affected, no occupant or firefighter injuries reported. The incident remains under investigation. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E100 E273 E290 E39 E83 E90 RA100 RA83 SO1 T73 T90; CH8; 17; Lyndsey Lantz
